text: The Rio Grande do Sul State University (, UERGS) is a Brazilian public university. It was founded in 2001 in the city of Porto Alegre and its campuses are distributed across several cities in the Rio Grande do Sul state. ==References== Category:Universities and colleges in Rio Grande do Sul Category:Educational institutions established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Brazil Category:State universities in Brazil
title: Rio Grande do Sul State University
